subject: Ethics
title: AI-Generated Propaganda
description: Learn AI-Generated Propaganda in one minute.

hook.text: In 2023, an AI-generated image of a Pentagon explosion went viral and briefly crashed the stock market.

buildup.text: State actors and extremists now use AI to produce propaganda at scaleâ€”thousands of posts per hour.

discovery.text: AI propaganda doesn't need to convince. It just needs to flood the zone and make truth impossible to find.

twist.text: Traditional fact-checking takes hours. AI generates a new lie every second. The math doesn't work.

climax.text: Democracies depend on shared facts. AI-generated propaganda attacks the foundation, not just the message.

punchline.text: You don't need to win the argument. Just drown it.

quiz.question: What makes AI-generated propaganda especially dangerous?
options: It's always easy to identify as fake
It can be produced at massive scale, overwhelming fact-checkers
It only works in printed newspapers
